Allows the user to type in account ids instead of using drag and drop.

Should the client control sort the hierarchy alphabetically. (N or Y)
Does the proxy have authentication? (N or Y)
If login is required should the control use the logged in Windows account or prompt the user for proxy credentials? (N or Y)
